data.name: The Sinking City Artbook & OST Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Sinking City Artbook: The Sinking City artbook presents the ultimate collection of key production art, sketches, concept designs, and breathtaking paintings that embody the essence of the deep oozing fear and cosmic horror of the Cthulhu Mythos.
With over 160 pages of designs and visuals of characters, locations, landscapes, hair-raising monsters, and the artist team's comments, you'll plunge into the Lovecraftian world of primordial dark and elusive madness.
Every piece of the artwork perfectly conveys the atmosphere of the game and unravels its universe even wider. Get yourself behind the scenes of this action-adventure detective classic and dive into the flooded secrets of Oakmont.
Includes artworks from The Sinking City and its DLCs.

The Sinking City Soundtrack: Get absorbed in the beautiful and cryptic harmonies of Oakmont through the original soundtrack for The Sinking City, brought to life by Serhii Sedliar and Viacheslav Pakalin.
The collection includes all the instrumental compositions that accompany the gameplay and the story. Immerse yourself into the dark harmonic passages that transfer you to the flooded, gloomy streets of Oakmont and make you feel the presence of the unknown.
The mysterious and atmospheric vision of Lovecraftian sound and melody permeates through all thirty tracks, surrounding you with supernatural sonic vibes. Each note and timbre convey the aural image of the Cthulhu Mythos.
